name: Dead of the Dawn
description:
Thanks for playing!

This was our entry for the LP Spooky Jam 2021 by the dandyfancy peole at the Lithex Productions discord server

Discord Invite: https://discord.gg/TyPDKPF

Instructions: 

WASD to move Space, once the prompt shows press to convert the tombstones into allied zombies.

The story: 

Once upon a time a little girl wanted all things to go her way then her mother said, thats enough! and sent her away

The forest at first was not too bad, there was plenty to eat But one day the food was not for her, food was her instead!

So poor Dawn, got really mad. Her spirit would keep things going her way! And then one day, there it was, the Zombie Apocalypse Day!

But Dawn had already claimed, her little place in the spirit realm. She would not share it, not with the living and not with the dead!

Very angry, Dawn decided to clean it off. "This little island is mine of my own!"

And then, to her uppity persona, a witchy spell came.

"Turn the Zombies into my Allies, to get Rid of the other Dead! And once we are done, then we are going to play!
